rdf:Description.dc:title: The orator 2008
rdf:Description.dc:creator: Alberta. Ministry of Aboriginal Relations.
rdf:Description.dc:publisher: [Edmonton, Alta.] : Alberta Ministry of Aboriginal Relations,
rdf:Description.dc:description: Description based on March 2010 issue printed on Aug. 11, 2010.

"The Orator is the Ministry of Aboriginal Relations newsletter. It draws its name from the historic oral tradition that has been vitally important in preserving Aboriginal history and culture in Alberta. The Orator helps the Ministry regularly connect with diverse group of stakeholders Ã¢€“ Aboriginal communities and organizations, industry associations, individual companies, federal and provincial government departments and municipalities, members of the Legislative Assembly, the media and members of the public." - web site. Mar. 14, 2011.
System requirements for online access: Adobe Acrobat.
Mode of access: World Wide Web.
AGL Capital Boulevard Site (AEE): locally printed copies.
